meanings.definition: Skillful or clever in a quick, sure, and easy way.
meanings.sent1: She is the deftest player on the team, always scoring goals effortlessly.
meanings.sent2: The deftest chef in the kitchen can whip up a delicious meal in minutes.
meanings.sent3: With her deftest moves, she danced around the room like a graceful swan.
meanings.sent4: His deftest strategy in the game was like a master chess player planning every move.
meanings.sent5: The deftest magician amazed the audience with his sleight of hand tricks.

meanings.sent1: The deftest painter in the group created a beautiful masterpiece with just a few strokes.
meanings.sent2: Her deftest solution to the problem impressed everyone with its simplicity and effectiveness.
meanings.sent3: The deftest squirrel managed to outsmart the other animals in the forest with its clever tricks.
meanings.sent4: His deftest disguise at the party fooled everyone into thinking he was someone else.
meanings.sent5: The deftest mechanic fixed the car in record time, leaving everyone amazed at his skills.
